Export.Routine: INBUANZ(KONT) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; BUCHUNGEN ANZEIGEN ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; AUFRUF = DO ^INBUANZ(KONT) ; ; ; History : ; 07-Jun-2010 GRF SR17146: call "DD.MM.YYYY" wrapper for WWWDATE1 (DMY) & ; for WWWDATE (IntToDMY) ; 21.01.2000 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW SYSTEM,VOL,BET,MAN,UCI,FDAT,X,I,T,LFN,PROJEKT SET $PIECE(YVOR,Y,7)=2 ;FONT SIZE SET SALDO="" SET BET=$ORDER(^INFIBPAR(0,YM,"")) QUIT:BET="" SET YFPARA=$GET(^INFIBPAR(0,YM,BET,1)) SET MAN=0 IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,2)'="" SET MAN=$PIECE(YFPARA,Y,2) ;MANDANT IN FIBU ;Company within QUIT:MAN="" IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,3)'="" SET BET=$PIECE(YFPARA,Y,3) ;BETRIEB IN FIBU ;location within SET UCI=YUCI IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,1)'="" SET UCI=$PIECE(YFPARA,Y,1) ;NAMESPACE IN FIBU ;within ; QUIT:$GET(KONT)="" ;NICHT VORHANDEN ;Not on hand SET FDAT="FDE02" IF $DATA(^INLIEFs(YM,4,$$^WWWUMLAU(KONT,1))) SET FDAT="FKR02" ;KREDITOR IF $DATA(^INKUNDEs(YM,4,$$^WWWUMLAU(KONT,1))) SET FDAT="FDE02" ;DEBITOR IF FDAT="" QUIT SET VOL=UCI KILL ^FSORT(VOL,$JOB),^WWWSOR(YUSER) ; WRITE YCR SET SYSTEM="" ; ;IF KONT=3 DO SIMBA DO DRUCK QUIT ;TEST !! ; IF +$PIECE(YFPARA,Y,41)=1 DO MANU DO DRUCK QUIT ;WEM;25214;ERRECHNUNG DER OPs OHNE FIBU;05.03.2004 IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,15)=1 DO ABACUS DO DRUCK QUIT ;ABACUS IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,15)=4 DO DISC QUIT ;DISC IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,15)=5 DO SIMBA QUIT ;SIMBA VERSION K 2.4.100 MIT CACHE 4.1.16 ;FIS;26128;12.10.04 ;IF $PIECE(YFPARA,Y,15)=5 DO SIMBA DO DRUCK QUIT ;SIMBA VERSION K 2.4.100 MIT CACHE 4.1.16 ;FIS;26128;12.10.04 ; QUIT ; ; ABACUS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; DO ;ABACUS . ;DO BEWE^%YABAF4(FDAT,MAN,BET,KONT,1,UCI,SYSTEM) ;ALT . SET YOP="YOP" . DO OP^%YABAF1(FDAT,BET,KONT,YOP,"XXX",$JOB,MAN,UCI,VOL,0,1) . QUIT QUIT ; DISC ;------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; if $GET(YFORM)="INLIEF" IF $$EXIST^%R("FINAPInvoice.OBJ",$GET(YUCI)) do ShowInvoices^FINAPInvoice(KONT,1) ;Bec;05.12.03;24774;pRÜFUNG AUF COMP. if $GET(YFORM)="INKUNDE" QUIT ; MANU ; MANUELLE ERRECHNUNG DER OFFENEN POSTEN (OHNE FIBU) ;the item ; NEW BELEG,RE,RB,SATZ1,DAT,TIME,CUS,TCUS,SATZ,SUM,SUMP,AUF,DAT,KONT1,BUCHUNG,DATUM,DATX,SKONTO,SKTO,KOND,KUNDE,DIFF ; SET SUM=0 SET BUCHUNG=0 ; SET SKONTO=0 SET KUNDE=$ORDER(^INKUNDEs(YM,4,KONT,"")) ;KUNDENNUMMER AUS KONTO ;out of acct. IF KUNDE'="" DO . SET KOND=$PIECE($GET(^INKUNDE(YM,KUNDE,1)),Y,56) ;ZAHLUNGSKONDITION . IF KOND'="" SET SKONTO=$PIECE($GET(^INKOND(YM,KOND,1)),Y,3) . QUIT ; SET KONT1=$$^WWWUMLAU($GET(KONT),1) SET DAT="" FOR SET DAT=$ORDER(^INREBUCHs(YM,5," ",KONT1,DAT)) QUIT:DAT="" DO . SET TIME="" . FOR SET TIME=$ORDER(^INREBUCHs(YM,5," ",KONT1,DAT,TIME)) QUIT:TIME="" DO . . SET CUS="" . . FOR SET CUS=$ORDER(^INREBUCHs(YM,5," ",KONT1,DAT,TIME,CUS)) QUIT:CUS="" DO . . . SET TCUS=CUS . . . SET SATZ=$GET(^INREBUCH(YM,DAT,TIME,CUS,1)) . . . KILL SUM . . . SET SKTO=0 . . . SET AUF=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,7) . . . SET BUCHUNG=BUCHUNG+1 . . . SET BUCHUNG(BUCHUNG)="" . . .;SET DATUM = $$^WWWDATE(DAT) ; SR17146 . . . SET DATUM = $$IntToDMY^WWWDATE(DAT) ; as DD.MM.YYYY . . . SET DATUM = $EXTRACT(DATUM,7,10)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,4,5)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,2) ; as YYYYMMDD . . . IF +SKONTO'=0 SET SKTO=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,6)/100*SKONTO ;BETRAG SKONTO ;Sum . . . IF AUF'="" SET SUM("S")=$GET(SUM("S"))+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,6) ;GESAMTER AUFTRAGSRECHNUNGSBETRAG . . . SET ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",DATUM_"|"_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,2),BUCHUNG,1)=0_"^"_"^"_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,6)_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_AUF . . . SET SUM("B",BUCHUNG)=DATUM_"|"_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,2) ;SPEICHERN FÜR LÖSCHUNG DER ZEILE ;Save to the . . . IF AUF'="" DO . . . . SET DATX="" . . . . FOR SET DATX=$ORDER(^INAUFPZ(YM,AUF,DATX)) QUIT:DATX="" DO . . . . . SET SATZ1=$GET(^INAUFPZ(YM,AUF,DATX,1)) . . . . . QUIT:$PIECE(SATZ1,Y,25)="" ;KEINE ZAHLUNG SONDERN NUR ZAHLUNGSAUFFORDERUNG ;no payment only . . . . . SET BUCHUNG = BUCHUNG+1 . . . . .;SET DATUM = $$^WWWDATE(DATX) ; SR17146 . . . . . SET DATUM = $$IntToDMY^WWWDATE(DATX) ; as DD.MM.YYYY . . . . . SET DATUM = $EXTRACT(DATUM,7,10)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,4,5)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,2) ; as YYYYMMDD . . . . . SET SUM("H") = $GET(SUM("H"))+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,2) ;GESAMTEBEZAHLT . . . . . SET ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",DATUM_"|"_$PIECE(SATZ1,Y,25),BUCHUNG,1)=1_"^"_"^"_$PIECE(SATZ1,Y,2)_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_AUF . . . . . SET SUM("B",BUCHUNG)=DATUM_"|"_$PIECE(SATZ1,Y,25) ;SPEICHERN FÜR LÖSCHUNG DER ZEILE ;Save to the . . . ; . . . SET DIFF=$GET(SUM("S"))-$GET(SUM("H"))-$GET(SKTO) . . . IF DIFF<0 SET DIFF=DIFF*-1 . . . IF DIFF<1 DO ;LÖSCHEN WENN GLEICH ODER FAST GLEICH ;Delete when without delay Or next without delay . . . . NEW BUCH . . . . SET BUCH="" . . . . FOR SET BUCH=$ORDER(SUM("B",BUCH)) QUIT:BUCH="" . . . . . KILL ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",SUM("B",BUCH),BUCH,1) ;LÖSCHEN EINTRAG, DA AUSGEGLICHEN . . . . . QUIT . . . . QUIT . . . QUIT . . QUIT . QUIT ; SET KONT1=$$^WWWUMLAU($ORDER(^INLIEFs(YM,4,KONT,"")),1) IF KONT1'="" FOR RB=0," " DO ; LIEFERANT ;supplier . SET BELEG="" . FOR SET BELEG=$ORDER(^INERECHs(YM,8,RB,KONT1,BELEG)) QUIT:BELEG="" DO . . SET DATX="" . . FOR SET DATX=$ORDER(^INERECHs(YM,8,RB,KONT1,BELEG,DATX)) QUIT:DATX="" DO . . . SET SATZ = $GET(^INERECH(YM,KONT1,BELEG,DATX,1)) . . . SET BUCHUNG = BUCHUNG+1 . . .;SET DATUM = $$^WWWDATE(DATX) ; SR17146 . . . SET DATUM = $$IntToDMY^WWWDATE(DATX) ; as DD.MM.YYYY . . . SET DATUM = $EXTRACT(DATUM,7,10)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,4,5)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,2) ; as YYYYMMDD . . . SET SUM("H") = $GET(SUM("H"))+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,10) ;GESAMTEBEZAHLT . . . SET ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",DATUM_"|"_BELEG,BUCHUNG,1)=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,120)_"^"_"^"_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,10)_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,25) QUIT SIMBA ; SIMBA OFFENEN POSTEN LISTE ;SIMBA item list NEW TTMMJJJJ,PV,PVX,FILE,VERZ,YBSZ,YEOFILE,LFN,BETRAG,REC,DATUM,BELEG,BUCH,KONTO,TEXT,SOLLHABEN,LOCAL,%html,YI,SALDOREQ,URL ;ET TTMMJJJJ = $TRANSLATE($$^WWWDATE(+$HOROLOG,"DE"),".") ; SR17146 SET TTMMJJJJ = $TRANSLATE($$IntToDMY^WWWDATE(+$HOROLOG),".") SET PV = "O#S###"_MAN_"##" ;OFFENE POSTEN LISTE, SCS-SCHNITTSTELLE SET PVX = "##"_TTMMJJJJ_"#"_KONT_"#"_KONT_"###J#N" ;OFFENE POSTEN EINES KUNDEN/LIEFERANTEN SET URL=$PIECE(YFPARA,Y,30) SET URL=$TRANSLATE(URL,"\","/") IF $FIND(URL,"//") SET URL=$PIECE(URL,"//",2) SET SALDOREQ=0 IF $GET(SIMSALDO)="X" SET SALDOREQ=1 ;EINSPRUNG AUS INSALSO ! IF SALDOREQ'=1 NEW SIMSALDO SET SIMSALDO=0 SET LOCAL=0 IF LOCAL=0 DO ;REMOTE CALL . ;IF YHYPER=0 DO ;WEBLINK . . NEW LINES . . SET URL=URL_"?YPV="_PV_"&YPVX="_PVX_"&YUCI="_UCI . . SET LINES=$$GET^WWWHTTP(URL,50) ;SEITE ANFORDERN,RÜCKGABE IN %html . . ;IF $DATA(%html) ZWRITE %html . . IF $DATA(%html) SET LINE="" FOR SET LINE=$ORDER(%html(LINE)) QUIT:LINE="" DO . . . SET KEY=$PIECE($GET(%html(LINE))," = ",1) . . . SET KEY(1)=$PIECE(KEY,"/",1) . . . SET KEY(2)=$PIECE(KEY,"/",2) . . . SET SATZ=$PIECE($GET(%html(LINE))," = ",2) . . . IF '$FIND(SATZ,"^^") QUIT . . . IF SALDOREQ'=1 SET ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",KEY(1),KEY(2),1)=SATZ . . . QUIT . . QUIT . DO ;IF YHYPER=1 DO ;CSP . . NEW %html1,httprequest . . Set httprequest=##class(%Net.HttpRequest).%New() . . Set httprequest.Server=$PIECE(URL,"/",1) ;"172.16.0.176" . . Set httprequest.Timeout="10" . . ;Set httprequest.Port=1972 . . Do httprequest.SetParam("YPV",PV) . . Do httprequest.SetParam("YPVX",PVX) . . Do httprequest.SetParam("YM",MAN) . . Do httprequest.SetParam("YUCI",UCI) . . Do httprequest.Post($PIECE(URL,"/",2,99)) ;"/csp/user/User.SimbaOP.cls" . . if 'httprequest.HttpResponse quit . . set %html1=httprequest.HttpResponse.Data.Read(32000) . . FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(%html1,$CHAR(13,10),YI,9999)="" DO . . . SET %html(YI)=$PIECE(%html1,$CHAR(13,10),YI) . . . SET KEY=$PIECE($GET(%html(YI))," = ",1) . . . SET KEY(1)=$PIECE(KEY,"/",1) . . . SET KEY(2)=$PIECE(KEY,"/",2) . . . SET SATZ=$PIECE($GET(%html(YI))," = ",2) . . . IF '$FIND(SATZ,"^^") QUIT . . . ;SET $PIECE(SATZ,"^",1)=0 ;SOLL . . . ;IF FDAT="FKR02" IF $PIECE(SATZ,"^",3)<0 SET $PIECE(SATZ,"^",1)=1 ;HABEN ;ERFOLGT BEREITS IN SimbaOP . . . ;IF FDAT="FDE02" IF $PIECE(SATZ,"^",3)<0 SET $PIECE(SATZ,"^",1)=1 ;HABEN . . . SET SIMSALDO=SIMSALDO+$TRANSLATE($PIECE(SATZ,"^",3),",") ;BETRAG . . . IF $PIECE(SATZ,"^",3)<0 SET $PIECE(SATZ,"^",3)=$PIECE(SATZ,"^",3)*-1 . . . IF SALDOREQ'=1 SET ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",KEY(1),KEY(2),1)=SATZ . . . QUIT . . ;Do httprequest.%Close() // object is closed; OREF value is "suspended" . . QUIT . ; . QUIT:SALDOREQ=1 . IF '$DATA(%html) WRITE ""_$$^WWWTEXT(46)_" !" ;KEINE DATEN VORHANDEN . IF +SIMSALDO'=0 DO . . NEW SALDO . . IF FDAT="FKR02" SET SIMSALDO=SIMSALDO*-1 ;HABEN . . SET SALDO=0 . . DO SIMBA^INSALDO . . WRITE ""_$$^WWWTEXT(32004)_": "_$$^WWWZAHL(SALDO,12,2,YWHR)_" "_$PIECE(SALDO," ",2)_"" ;saldo . . QUIT . DO DRUCK . QUIT ; IF LOCAL=1 DO ;SIMBA IN GLEICHER DATENBANK . IF YUCI'=UCI ZNSPACE UCI . SET FILE=##class(Datenverwaltung.BuchungsdatenExportieren).clsEXPORT(KONT,PV,PVX) . IF YUCI'=UCI ZNSPACE YUCI . ; . IF '$FIND(FILE,"SCS") QUIT ;FEHLER ;shortcoming . ; . SET VERZ="c:/SBCache/Temp" . SET FILE=$PIECE($PIECE(FILE,$CHAR(22,22),2),$CHAR(22),1) . SET FILE=VERZ_"/"_FILE . SET YBSZ=$$READ^WWWDEV(FILE) . IF YBSZ="" QUIT . ; . SET YEOFILE=$ZUTIL(68,40,1) . SET BUCH=0 . USE YBSZ . FOR LFN=1:1 READ REC#10000:1 QUIT:$ZEOF=-1 QUIT:'$TEST QUIT:REC="EOF" DO . . IF $TRANSLATE($PIECE(REC,";",1),"""")="BCH" DO . . . SET SOLLHABEN=0 . . . SET BETRAG=$$^WWWTR(1,8,$TRANSLATE($PIECE(REC,";",2),"""")) . . . SET BETRAG=$EXTRACT(BETRAG,1,$LENGTH(BETRAG)-2)_"."_$EXTRACT(BETRAG,$LENGTH(BETRAG)-1,$LENGTH(BETRAG)) . . . SET SIMSALDO=SIMSALDO+BETRAG . . . QUIT:SALDOREQ=1 . . . SET FDAT="FKR02" IF BETRAG>0 SET SOLLHABEN=1 . . . SET FDAT="FDE02" IF BETRAG<0 SET SOLLHABEN=1 . . . SET:BETRAG<0 BETRAG=BETRAG*-1 . . . SET DATUM=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(REC,";",8),"""") . . . IF $EXTRACT(DATUM,5,6)<95 SET DATUM="20"_$EXTRACT(DATUM,5,6)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,3,4)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,2) . . . IF $EXTRACT(DATUM,5,6)'<95 SET DATUM="19"_$EXTRACT(DATUM,5,6)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,3,4)_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,2) . . . SET BELEG=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(REC,";",6),"""") . . . SET KONTO=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(REC,";",5),"""") . . . SET TEXT=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(REC,";",14),"""") . . . SET BUCH=BUCH+1 . . . IF SALDOREQ'=1 SET ^FSORT("XXX",$JOB,"OP",DATUM_"|"_BELEG,BUCH,1)=SOLLHABEN_"^"_"^"_BETRAG_"^"_KONTO_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_"^"_TEXT . . . QUIT . . QUIT . CLOSE YBSZ . DO OPEN^WWWSTART . QUIT:SALDOREQ=1 . IF +SIMSALDO'=0 WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32004)_": "_$$^WWWZAHL(SALDO,12,2,YWHR) ;saldo . DO DRUCK . QUIT QUIT ; DRUCK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; DO ^WWWFRAME(0) SET YDDSATZ=0 DO HEAD ;------------------------------------------------------------------------ SET VOL=$ORDER(^FSORT("")) ;VOLUME SET VOL="XXX" SET YDDSATZ=0 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------ IF VOL'="" SET X="" FOR SET X=$ORDER(^FSORT(VOL,$JOB,"OP",X)) QUIT:X="" SET LFN=0 FOR SET LFN=$ORDER(^FSORT(VOL,$JOB,"OP",X,LFN)) QUIT:LFN="" DO ; . NEW SH,BETRAG,T,Z,BELEG,DATUM . SET T=$GET(^FSORT(VOL,$JOB,"OP",X,LFN,1)) . ; . ;SET SH=$PIECE(T,"^",8) . SET SH="S" . IF $PIECE(T,"^",1)=1 SET SH="H" . ; . ;SET BELEG=+$PIECE(T,"^",1) . SET BELEG=$PIECE(X,"|",2) . ; . SET DATUM=$PIECE(X,"|",1) .;SET DATUM=$$^WWWDATE1($EXTRACT(DATUM,7,8)_"."_$EXTRACT(DATUM,5,6)_"."_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,4)) ; SR17146 . SET DATUM=$$DMY^WWWDATE1($EXTRACT(DATUM,7,8)_"."_$EXTRACT(DATUM,5,6)_"."_$EXTRACT(DATUM,1,4)) . ; . SET BETRAG=$PIECE(T,"^",3) . QUIT:+BETRAG=0 ;FAN;15.02.05;27256 . WRITE YCR . DO NL^WWWTAB . DO NF^WWWTAB . WRITE "" . WRITE BELEG ;BELEGNUMMER . WRITE " " . ; . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE "" . ;WRITE $PIECE(T,"^",2) ;BELEGDATUM .;WRITE $$^WWWDATE(DATUM) ;BELEGDATUM ; SR17146 . WRITE $$IntToDMY^WWWDATE(DATUM) ;BELEGDATUM . WRITE " " . ; . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE "" . WRITE $PIECE(T,"^",4) ;GEGENKONTO . WRITE " " . ; . DO ZWR^WWWTAB . WRITE "" . ;WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(T,"^",7),12,2,YWHR) ;BETRAG . WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(BETRAG,12,2,YWHR) ;BETRAG ;Sum . WRITE " " . ; . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE "" . IF SPRACHE'="DE" SET SH=$TRANSLATE(SH,"SH","DK") . WRITE SH ;SOLL/HABEN . WRITE " " . ; . DO ZW^WWWTAB . WRITE "" . ;WRITE $PIECE(T,"^",3) ;BUCHUNGSTEXT . WRITE $PIECE(T,"^",12) ;BUCHUNGSTEXT . WRITE " " . . ;DO ZW^WWWTAB . ;WRITE "" . ;WRITE $PIECE(T,"^",6) ;STEUERSCHL. . ;WRITE " " . ; . ;DO ZW^WWWTAB . ;WRITE "" . ;WRITE $PIECE(T,"^",5) ;JOURNALSEITE . ;WRITE " " . ; . DO ZW^WWWTAB . SET PROJEKT="" . IF $PIECE(T,"^",12)'="" SET PROJEKT=$PIECE($GET(^INAUF(YM,$PIECE(T,"^",12),1)),Y,8) ;25873;FAN;12.10.2004 ;buff . WRITE "" . WRITE PROJEKT . WRITE " " . DO EF^WWWTAB . DO EL^WWWTAB . ; . QUIT ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------ KILL ^FSORT("ZZZ0") KILL ^FSORT("ZZZ1") KILL ^FSORT(VOL,$JOB) ; IF YDDSATZ<10 DO LEER^WWWTAB(10-YDDSATZ,7) ;TYBD;14,7,2004 ; DO ^WWWFRAME(1) ; QUIT ; HEAD ; DO ;KOPF ;pate . WRITE YCR . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32006) ;"BELEGNUMMER" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32007) ;"BELEGDATUM" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32008) ;"GEGENKONTO" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32009) ;"BETRAG" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32010) ;"S/H" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32011) ;"BUCHUNGSTEXT" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("INAUF","D",8) ;PROJEKT ;scheme . WRITE "" . ;WRITE "" . ;WRITE "" . ;WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32013) ;"JOURNALSEITE" . ;WRITE "" . ;WRITE "" . ; . QUIT QUIT ;
